title: Coronavirus: Scientists brand 5G claims 'complete rubbish'
description: Claims 5G harms immune systems or spreads the virus have been condemned by the scientific community.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Conspiracy theories claiming 5G technology helps transmit coronavirus have been condemned by the scientific community.
